javadoc: Base class for the various node objects used to build the component hierarchy.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new Node.
@param winMgr the DockingWindowManager that this node belongs to.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: winMgr
params.comment: the DockingWindowManager that this node belongs to.

methods.javadoc:
Returns this node's window manager
@return the window manager
methods.name: getDockingWindowManager

methods.javadoc:
Gets all children of this node; an empty list if no children exist.
@return all children of this node.
methods.name: getChildren
methods.comment: Gets all children of this node; an empty list if no children exist.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a component that manages all the components from the nodes below it
@return the component
methods.name: getComponent
methods.comment: Returns a component that manages all the components from the nodes below it

methods.name: contains
methods.comment: Determine if this node contains the specified component

return.comment: true if this node contains the specified component

methods.name: saveToXML
methods.comment:
Returns an JDOM element object that contains the configuration state of this node 
 and its children

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given node as a child.
@param node the node to be removed.
methods.name: removeNode
methods.comment: Removes the given node as a child.

methods.name: replaceNode
methods.comment: Replaces the oldNode child with the newNode.

params.name: newNode
params.comment: the node to replace the old node.

methods.javadoc:
Puts into the given list all active components in this node
@param list the results list
methods.name: populateActiveComponents
methods.comment: Puts into the given list all active components in this node

methods.javadoc: Marks this node and all ancestors as invalid and needing to be rebuilt.
methods.name: invalidate
methods.comment: Marks this node and all ancestors as invalid and needing to be rebuilt.

methods.name: processChildElement
methods.comment: Generates a node corresponding to the given XML element

params.name: elem
params.comment: the XML element for which to generate a node

params.name: mgr
params.comment: the DockingWindowsManager for the new node

params.name: parentNode
params.comment: the parent node for the new node

params.name: restoredPlaceholders
params.comment:
a 'results' list into which will be placed any restored
        placeholders

return.comment: the new node generated from the XML element

methods.javadoc:
Returns a descriptive name for this node.
@return a descriptive name for this node.
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a descriptive name for this node.

return.comment: a descriptive name for this node.

methods.javadoc:
Prints the hierarchy of nodes represented by this node
@return a string representation of the hierarchy of nodes represented by this node.
methods.name: printTree
methods.comment: Prints the hierarchy of nodes represented by this node

return.comment: a string representation of the hierarchy of nodes represented by this node.

name: Node
comment: Base class for the various node objects used to build the component hierarchy.
